```{r, eval=FALSE}
dataframe$periodframe <- ifelse(dataframe$year > 1991,"post-1991", "pre-1991")

plants_df %>% select(percent_cover) %>% with(hist(percent_cover))
plants_df |> filter (dist_from_edge_m == "0.0",dist_from_edge_m == "6.0" ) |> summary()
plants_df |> filter (dist_from_edge_m == "0.0",dist_from_edge_m == "6.0" ) |> length()
```


Superscripts may be written by surrounding the superscripted text by ^ characters;
subscripts may be written by surrounding the subscripted text by ~ characters. 
Thus, for example,

- H~2~O is a liquid.  
- 2^10^ is 1024

```ansi
- H~2~O is a liquid.  
- 2^10^ is 1024
```
